resources.string:
Humans 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 are gifted with enormous potential and all of must strive together to stop this pandemic 🦠 outbreak at the earliest ,
Take Precaution ! 😷 
Try Prevent Spread 🧼👐🚰 ! 
Protect yourself and your neighbourhood 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 🤧🤲 ! 
 Preserve your health ♥️ and enrich your immunity! 
Seeing the situation that the novel coronavirus 2019 🦠 has created around me, made me question myself if I, as a student 👨🏻‍🎓 and developer 🧑🏻‍💻 how could I help in this global 🌏 crisis and challenging time ⏳. Then did, I get this idea about bringing awareness to people about the precautions, preventions and things to protect ourselves from COVID19 as well as preserve and enrich our health 👩🏻‍⚕️ in a playful and interactive way for everyone. We mainly tried to focus our interactive app to help kids 👧🏻👦🏻👦🏻👩🏻 get to know about coronavirus easily while enjoying. If you experience any symptoms of nCOVID-19, plesae visit your nearest health care centre 🏥👩🏻‍⚕️ or contact your medical care number 📱📞 at the earliest for a nCOVID-19 test! 
 To know more about the app and usage pls visit @

Please share ♻️ with your friends, family and neighbours 👬 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 so we can stop this pandemic 🦠 at the earliest !

Ready to Fight nCOVID19 but don\'t know how? Here let me help you!
